lit_ml: (Maniso - Anthem - Of Mor Severios)
lit_en: (Maniso - Anthem - Of Mor Severios)
lit_mn: (Maniso - Anthem - Of Mor Severios)

lit_ml:
By Thy Motherís Earnest Prayírs
By Thy Saintís Entreaties:
I adore Thee, Lord and king,
Sole begotten, heavenly One,
Word and Father’s Son
Though Immortal Thou dost be In Thy nature true,
Thou descendedst by Thy grace,
Bringing life salvation free For our fallen human race;
Thou incarnate wast of her,
Holy Virgin blest Mary, glorious, chaste and pure,
Mother of our God.
Man becoming nor with change,
Thou wast crucified for us,
Christ, who art our Lord and God;
Thou didst trample death by death,
Ending this our death.
Thou art One of Persons three,
Holy Trinity,
Worshipped equal praised the same,
With the Father, and the Holy Ghost,
Have Thou mercy on us all.
lit_en:
By Thy Motherís Earnest Prayírs
By Thy Saintís Entreaties:
I adore Thee, Lord and king,
Sole begotten, heavenly One,
Word and Father’s Son
Though Immortal Thou dost be In Thy nature true,
Thou descendedst by Thy grace,
Bringing life salvation free For our fallen human race;
Thou incarnate wast of her,
Holy Virgin blest Mary, glorious, chaste and pure,
Mother of our God.
Man becoming nor with change,
Thou wast crucified for us,
Christ, who art our Lord and God;
Thou didst trample death by death,
Ending this our death.
Thou art One of Persons three,
Holy Trinity,
Worshipped equal praised the same,
With the Father, and the Holy Ghost,
Have Thou mercy on us all.
lit_mn:
By Thy Motherís Earnest Prayírs
By Thy Saintís Entreaties:
I adore Thee, Lord and king,
Sole begotten, heavenly One,
Word and Father’s Son
Though Immortal Thou dost be In Thy nature true,
Thou descendedst by Thy grace,
Bringing life salvation free For our fallen human race;
Thou incarnate wast of her,
Holy Virgin blest Mary, glorious, chaste and pure,
Mother of our God.
Man becoming nor with change,
Thou wast crucified for us,
Christ, who art our Lord and God;
Thou didst trample death by death,
Ending this our death.
Thou art One of Persons three,
Holy Trinity,
Worshipped equal praised the same,
With the Father, and the Holy Ghost,
Have Thou mercy on us all.

lit_ml: (Hymn before the Lesson)
lit_en: (Hymn before the Lesson)
lit_mn: (Hymn before the Lesson)

lit_ml:
Those Apostles,
Chosen, sent by God, they went to evíry place,
Through all the world,
Gentiles heard from them the news,
the Gospel grace.
They proclaimed - the kingdom,
Heavíns rule - of freedom,
For the faithful bliss.
lit_en:
Those Apostles,
Chosen, sent by God, they went to evíry place,
Through all the world,
Gentiles heard from them the news,
the Gospel grace.
They proclaimed - the kingdom,
Heavíns rule - of freedom,
For the faithful bliss.
lit_mn:

the Gospel grace.

For the faithful bliss.

lit_ml: 2. FROM THE PAULINE EPISTLE
lit_en: 2. FROM THE PAULINE EPISTLE
lit_mn: 2. FROM THE PAULINE EPISTLE

lit_ml: (Hymn before the Lesson)
lit_en: (Hymn before the Lesson)
lit_mn: (Hymn before the Lesson)

lit_ml:
Paul The Blessed -
Saint, the Lordís Apostle, said
If one come to preach to you
Other doctrine than we knew,
Be he man or angel bright,
Cursíd be he in Churchís sight;
Doctrines all diverse arise,
Shooting up with many lies;
Blest is he who first and last
Trusts Godís truth and holds it fast.
lit_en:
Paul The Blessed -
Saint, the Lordís Apostle, said
If one come to preach to you
Other doctrine than we knew,
Be he man or angel bright,
Cursíd be he in Churchís sight;
Doctrines all diverse arise,
Shooting up with many lies;
Blest is he who first and last
Trusts Godís truth and holds it fast.
lit_mn:
Paul The Blessed -
Saint, the Lordís Apostle, said
If one come to preach to you
Other doctrine than we knew,
Be he man or angel bright,
Cursíd be he in Churchís sight;
Doctrines all diverse arise,
Shooting up with many lies;
Blest is he who first and last
Trusts Godís truth and holds it fast.

lit_en: HYMN AFTER THE GOSPEL
lit_mn: HYMN AFTER THE GOSPEL

lit_ml: (One of the following hymns or any other hymn prescribed for the occasion)
lit_en: (One of the following hymns or any other hymn prescribed for the occasion)
lit_mn: (One of the following hymns or any other hymn prescribed for the occasion)

lit_ml:
Blessed are those servants good
Whom their Lord shall find
Wakeful, working when He comes
To His Vine - yard good
Girding up His - lions He serves them all They who worked with - Him from morn till eve,
God the Father makes them sit,
And the Son Serves them
Lo, the Holy Paraclete
Plaits them victorís crowns Halleluiah - setting on their heads.
lit_en:
Blessed are those servants good
Whom their Lord shall find
Wakeful, working when He comes
To His Vine - yard good
Girding up His - lions He serves them all They who worked with - Him from morn till eve,
God the Father makes them sit,
And the Son Serves them
Lo, the Holy Paraclete
Plaits them victorís crowns Halleluiah - setting on their heads.
lit_mn:
Blessed are those servants good
Whom their Lord shall find
Wakeful, working when He comes
To His Vine - yard good
Girding up His - lions He serves them all They who worked with - Him from morn till eve,
God the Father makes them sit,
And the Son Serves them
Lo, the Holy Paraclete
Plaits them victorís crowns Halleluiah - setting on their heads.

lit_ml:
O Lord Christ, who by Thy feast
Gladdened those of earth and heavín
Here to Thee We offer now
Praise divine, humbly crying,
Holy, holy, holy art Thou, Lord.
Filled with Thee are all the heavíns,
All the earth Thy glory speaks;
Those on high call Thee Holy,
Those below call Thee Blessed:
Highest is the Fatherís cry,
Thou art my beloved Son
lit_en:
O Lord Christ, who by Thy feast
Gladdened those of earth and heavín
Here to Thee We offer now
Praise divine, humbly crying,
Holy, holy, holy art Thou, Lord.
Filled with Thee are all the heavíns,
All the earth Thy glory speaks;
Those on high call Thee Holy,
Those below call Thee Blessed:
Highest is the Fatherís cry,
Thou art my beloved Son
lit_mn:

lit_ml: Acolyte :- Barekmor: In the presence of the merciful Lord, and in front of His propitiating altar, and before these holy, divine and heavenly mysteries, and before this awe inspiring and sacred Eucharist, incense is placed by the hand of this reverend priest (Most Revered holy Father or Most Exalted holy Father); let us all pray and beseech of the Lord mercy and compassion.
lit_en: Acolyte :- Barekmor: In the presence of the merciful Lord, and in front of His propitiating altar, and before these holy, divine and heavenly mysteries, and before this awe inspiring and sacred Eucharist, incense is placed by the hand of this reverend priest (Most Revered holy Father or Most Exalted holy Father); let us all pray and beseech of the Lord mercy and compassion.

lit_ml: THE NICENE CREED
lit_en: THE NICENE CREED
lit_mn: THE NICENE CREED

lit_ml: Acolyte :- Attend we to divine wisdom. Let us all stand well and respond to the prayer of the reverend priest **(Most Revered holy Father (Or) Most Exalted Holy Father).
lit_en: Acolyte :- Attend we to divine wisdom. Let us all stand well and respond to the prayer of the reverend priest **(Most Revered holy Father (Or) Most Exalted Holy Father).
lit_mn: Acolyte :- Attend we to divine wisdom. Let us all stand well and respond to the prayer of the reverend priest **(Most Revered holy Father (Or) Most Exalted Holy Father).

lit_ml: Priest :- We believe In One True God,
lit_en: Priest :- We believe In One True God,
lit_mn: Priest :- We believe In One True God,

lit_ml: Acolyte :- The Father Almighty, Maker of heaven and earth, and of all things visible and invisible; And in the One Lord Jesus Christ, the Only begotten Son of God; begotten of the Father before all worlds; Light of Light; Very God of very God; begotten, not made; being of the same substance with the Father; and by whom all things were made:
lit_en: Acolyte :- The Father Almighty, Maker of heaven and earth, and of all things visible and invisible; And in the One Lord Jesus Christ, the Only begotten Son of God; begotten of the Father before all worlds; Light of Light; Very God of very God; begotten, not made; being of the same substance with the Father; and by whom all things were made:
lit_mn: Acolyte :- The Father Almighty, Maker of heaven and earth, and of all things visible and invisible; And in the One Lord Jesus Christ, the Only begotten Son of God; begotten of the Father before all worlds; Light of Light; Very God of very God; begotten, not made; being of the same substance with the Father; and by whom all things were made:

lit_ml: \t+ Who For Us Men, And For Our Salvation, Came Down From Heaven,
lit_en: \t+ Who For Us Men, And For Our Salvation, Came Down From Heaven,
lit_mn: \t+ Who For Us Men, And For Our Salvation, Came Down From Heaven,

lit_ml: \t+ And Was Incarnate Of The Holy Virgin Mary, Mother Of God, By The Holy Ghost, And Became Man:
lit_en: \t+ And Was Incarnate Of The Holy Virgin Mary, Mother Of God, By The Holy Ghost, And Became Man:
lit_mn: \t+ And Was Incarnate Of The Holy Virgin Mary, Mother Of God, By The Holy Ghost, And Became Man:

lit_ml: \t+ And Was Crucified For Us In The Days Of Pontius Pilate; And suffered, And Died, And Was Buried:
lit_en: \t+ And Was Crucified For Us In The Days Of Pontius Pilate; And suffered, And Died, And Was Buried:
lit_mn: \t+ And Was Crucified For Us In The Days Of Pontius Pilate; And suffered, And Died, And Was Buried:

lit_ml: And the third day rose again according to His will: and ascended into heaven, and sat on the right hand of the Father; and shall come again in His great glory to judge both the quick and the dead: whose kingdom shall have no end.
lit_en: And the third day rose again according to His will: and ascended into heaven, and sat on the right hand of the Father; and shall come again in His great glory to judge both the quick and the dead: whose kingdom shall have no end.
lit_mn: And the third day rose again according to His will: and ascended into heaven, and sat on the right hand of the Father; and shall come again in His great glory to judge both the quick and the dead: whose kingdom shall have no end.

lit_ml: And in the one living Holy Spirit, the life-giving Lord of all, who proceeds from the Father; and who with the Father and the Son is worshipped and glorified: who spoke by the prophets and the Apostles: And in the One, Holy, Catholic, and Apostolic Church:
lit_en: And in the one living Holy Spirit, the life-giving Lord of all, who proceeds from the Father; and who with the Father and the Son is worshipped and glorified: who spoke by the prophets and the Apostles: And in the One, Holy, Catholic, and Apostolic Church:
lit_mn: And in the one living Holy Spirit, the life-giving Lord of all, who proceeds from the Father; and who with the Father and the Son is worshipped and glorified: who spoke by the prophets and the Apostles: And in the One, Holy, Catholic, and Apostolic Church:

lit_ml: And we acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins: and look for the resurrection of the dead: And the new life in the world to come.
lit_en: And we acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins: and look for the resurrection of the dead: And the new life in the world to come.
lit_mn: And we acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins: and look for the resurrection of the dead: And the new life in the world to come.

lit_ml: People :-Amen.
lit_en: People :-Amen.
lit_mn: People :-Amen.

lit_ml: HO EDONO
lit_en: HO EDONO
lit_mn: HO EDONO

lit_ml:
Come, the time of prayír is here,
Come for pardon, have no fear;
íTis the time to ask anew,
íTis the time for mercy too.
lit_en:
Come, the time of prayír is here,
Come for pardon, have no fear;
íTis the time to ask anew,
íTis the time for mercy too.
lit_mn:
Come, the time of prayír is here,
Come for pardon, have no fear;
íTis the time to ask anew,
íTis the time for mercy too.

lit_ml:
See the holy priest ascend,
Mounting stairs which heav’nward tend,
There the pure Qurban to raise
For whoever communicates.
lit_en:
See the holy priest ascend,
Mounting stairs which heav’nward tend,
There the pure Qurban to raise
For whoever communicates.
lit_mn:
See the holy priest ascend,
Mounting stairs which heav’nward tend,
There the pure Qurban to raise
For whoever communicates.

lit_ml:
Mercy here is full and free,
Come, beloved, come and see,
Give the kiss of peace divine,
Hearts sincere in love combine.
lit_en:
Mercy here is full and free,
Come, beloved, come and see,
Give the kiss of peace divine,
Hearts sincere in love combine.
lit_mn:
Mercy here is full and free,
Come, beloved, come and see,
Give the kiss of peace divine,
Hearts sincere in love combine.

lit_ml:
Let us now be reconciled
To each heavínly Fatherís child,
So, before Godís throne of grace
Find compassion on His face.
lit_en:
Let us now be reconciled
To each heavínly Fatherís child,
So, before Godís throne of grace
Find compassion on His face.
lit_mn:
Let us now be reconciled
To each heavínly Fatherís child,
So, before Godís throne of grace
Find compassion on His face.

lit_ml:
Lord, have mercy on us now,
Grant forgiveness as we bow,
Answer, Lord, our earnest plea;
Good art Thou-though frail we be.
lit_en:
Lord, have mercy on us now,
Grant forgiveness as we bow,
Answer, Lord, our earnest plea;
Good art Thou-though frail we be.
lit_mn:
Lord, have mercy on us now,
Grant forgiveness as we bow,
Answer, Lord, our earnest plea;
Good art Thou-though frail we be.

lit_ml:
Stand we all and sing we well,
